name: Fresh Tomato Shrimp Pasta
author: Lisa Nichols
summary: Fresh tomatoes and spinach, fresh herbs, and fresh mozzarella combine with shrimp and fettuccine for an easy summer dinner.
ingredients: ½  sweet onion, cut into wedges
1 pound cooked shrimp - peeled and deveined
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add the pasta, and cook for 8 minutes, or until tender
In the container of a food processor, combine the garlic, onion and oregano
Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Add the onion mixture; cook and stir until fragrant and almost golden
Mix in the tomatoes, basil, salt and pepper
Simmer for about 5 minutes while the pasta is cooking, stirring occasionally
Mix in spinach until it wilts, then just before the pasta is done, stir in the shrimp
Toss with pasta in a large serving bowl, and mix in mozzarella cheese
